Package io.prometheus.client.metrics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Metric.Builder<B,M>
    A Metric.Builder is used to create a Metric's descriptor, which describes everything about the metric: name, required label dimensions (i.e., metric cardinality), docstring, etc.
    Metric.Child
    Metric.Child is a concrete metric, the thing you mutate.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Counter
    Counter is a Metric that tracks the addition or subtraction of a value from itself.
    Counter.Builder
    Define the characteristics for this Counter.
    Counter.Serializer Deprecated
    Gauge
    Gauge is a Metric that reports instantaneous values based on external state.
    Gauge.Builder
    Define the characteristics for this Gauge.
    Gauge.Serializer Deprecated
    Metric<M extends Metric,C extends Metric.Child,P extends Metric.Partial>
    A Metric is the base type of all Prometheus metrics.
    Summary
    Summary is a Metric that samples events over sliding windows of time.
    Summary.Builder  
    Summary.Serializer Deprecated
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Metric.IllegalLabelDeclarationException
    Metric.IllegalLabelDeclarationException is used in cases whereby the author of a metric declares an illegal label name.
